title: Short-Intensive Course for Strengthening Physics-Based Decision-Making Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Data-driven decision-making training using physics problems in a smartphone-based learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze physics experiment data to derive context-specific optimal decisions with at least 80% accuracy
Learners can identify their relative decision-making competency position compared to peers using Rasch model-based assessment tools
Learners can cultivate the ability to apply three or more decision-making strategies when solving dynamic electrical engineering problems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
